name: Waltz with Cats - Music Game
description:
Cute Illustrations of Cats and Animals came alive as Stickers

Looking for a casual music game with cute cats and animals?
Sticker Animals are dropping all sorts of objects, CATCH 'EM ALL!
With RELAXING MUSIC, there's nothing you can't do!
Release stress and have fun by playing with animal friends ヾ(*´ ∇ `)ﾉ

1. JOIN STICKER CAT & MAKEOVER! =^._.^= ∫
CUTE Animals at Zoo became Stickers!
Kitty, Dogs, Mouse, Sheep, Wolf, Dino, and Penguins
NEW & ORIGINAL Animals Coming to Waltz with Cats

2. Relaxing ASMR & Songs (ﾉ´ヮ´)ﾉ*:･ﾟ
Stress relieving music with animal friends
WITH Piano, Violin, and many more instruments
NEW Songs Coming to Waltz with Cats

3. Animal Friends are waiting for your HELP! ( つ ◕o◕ )つ
CATCH all falling objects!
SAVE the objects from falling on the ground
PLAY until you can't catch them all

4. New Themes & Backgrounds Coming (っ≧ω≦)っ
Let's go on an adventure with Animal Friends!
New Places like Kitchen, Study Room, Spaceship ... more to come!


If you are one of these game players, DOWNLOAD WALTZ WITH CATS NOW! (≧∇≦)/

- People looking for relaxing games, idle games or roleplay games
- People looking for adorable animal games or neko games
- People who love relaxing pocket camp games like Animal Crossing
- People who love cute simulation games like Damagotchi
- People who love healing music game like Like a Dino
- People who love collecting new animal friends like Pokemon
- People who love playing tycoon games

If you like or even love this game, please help us to spread the cute animals!
